short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that allows you to safely share your login credentials.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to share an account with your friend or colleague but it was too troublesome? ProfileShare solves this problem. It allows you to securely share your client-side encrypted profile while having full control over your account and not even revealing your password. 

- Share your accounts with anyone in one click without giving away your password.
- Remove access anytime.
- Send access to multiple people without the need to change your password whenever you want to stop sharing.
- Have control over what they use your account for.


ðŸ”‘ Everything is client-side encrypted with industry-grade AES-256 and the access keys never leave your computer.
